data.claim: Puppeteer/Playwright MCP servers enable full browser automation: screenshots, PDF generation, form filling, JavaScript execution, cookie management, network interception. Superior to basic webpage reading - enables true web interaction and scraping of JavaScript-rendered content.
data.snippet: Full Browser Automation – Complete control over headless Chrome. Screenshot and PDF Generation. Network Monitoring – Intercept and modify network requests. Cookie and Session Management. JavaScript Execution.
